Injector/Manterror/Double Punch/Counter Punch:



Injector fell back from Triceradon's shots, falling to his back.

---

Manterror fell back a foot as Dark Mouse shot him, raising his arms though, 
he took precise aim at the middle of the traitor's face.  Getting ready to 
fire and hopefully finish her off, several blasts sent him slamming into a 
tree.  Quickly assessing the situation, he fired an ion disk at Triceradon, 
though a few of the Maximal's shots sent him to the ground.

---

Counter Punch got behind a boulder, Triceradon's shots chipping at it.  
Getting up, he had his missile launcher in one arm, a photon rifle in the 
other.  Firing two shots off at Triceradon from the rifle, and a rocket at 
Stegotron, he let out an almost silent cry as the combined kick backs hurdled 
him to the ground backwards.

---

Double Punch leapt over a log, slamming to the ground feet first.  Raising a 
pincher, he launched Beeline, his cyber-bee to take up the fight as he slowly 
advanced.  Taking flight, the cyber-bee scanned the area of Manterror's 
coordinates.  Activating its laser weapons in its optic sensors, it acquired 
a target.  It dived, firing a single optic blast at Striker.
